title: A Campaign Against America | Guests: Ben Shapiro & Damani Felder | 7/21/20
description:
“The Right Brothers” founder Damani Felder recounts what he witnessed as Black Lives Matter protesters descended on a restaurant and describes why he can’t stand with them. The St. Louis couple who defended their home with firearms from protesters have been charged with a felony. Ben Shapiro reviews his new book, “How to Destroy America in Three Easy Steps.” Independent reporter Kalen D’Almeida went undercover at the Portland riots and describes what they were like. Fox News hosts are under fire from sexual misconduct allegations, and Tucker Carlson warns that the New York Times wants to dox his family. Parody is real as Glenn presents today’s Woke Party Citizen Brief. There’s a campaign against America, but it goes beyond politics.
